com.example.metrics.metrics

Class MetricsService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.metrics.metrics.MetricsService

  • @Service
public class MetricsService
extends java.lang.Object
    The metrics service encapsulates all of the operations that can be done on a metric. It holds a collection of metrics by the user. It holds a collection of statistics which are components that will provide an statistic report of the values of a metric. Those statistic are registered in the IOC container (Spring context) and get dependency injected when the bean is created. It also exposes a method to register more statistics at runtime.
